00003 namespace yamte;
00004 
00005 require_once 'YAException.php';
00006 require_once 'YAContext.php';
00007 require_once 'YAFunctions.php';
00008 
00012 class Yamte
00013 {
00014 
00015   private $templateData;
00016   private $contexts = array();
00017   private $contextInstances = array();
00018 
00023   public function __construct($templateFile)
00024   {
00025     if (is_file($templateFile)) {
00026       if ($fileData = fopen($templateFile, 'r')) {
00027         $this->templateData = fread($fileData, filesize($templateFile));
00028         $this->parseTemplate($this->templateData);
00029         $this->createContext();
00030         $this->openContext();
00031       } else {
00032         throw new YAException(2, $templateFile);
00033       }
00034     } else {
00035       throw new YAException(1, $templateFile);
00036     }
00037   }
00038 
00043   public function display($context = "|root|")
00044   {
00045     $this->closeContext($context);
00046     echo $this->contextInstances[$context]->getGeneratedCode();
00047   }
00048 
00054   public function setVariable($prefixedVarName, $varValue)
00055   {
00056     //If the variable has a prefix
00057     $varData = explode(".", $prefixedVarName);
00058     if (count($varData) == 2) {
00059       $context = $varData[0];
00060       $variable = $varData[1];
00061     } else {
00062       $context = "|root|";
00063       $variable = $varData[0];
00064     }
00065     $this->contextInstances[$context]->setVariable($variable, $varValue);
00066     return $this;
00067   }
00068 
00073   public function openContext($context = "|root|")
00074   {
00075     if (!isset($this->contextInstances[$context])) {
00076       throw new YAException(9, $context);
00077     }
00078     $this->contextInstances[$context]->init();
00079     return $this;
00080   }
00081 
00086   public function closeContext($context = "|root|")
00087   {
00088     if (!isset($this->contextInstances[$context])) {
00089       throw new YAException(9, $context);
00090     }
00091     $this->contextInstances[$context]->closeContext();
00092     return $this;
00093   }
00094 
00099   private function getContextName($templateSource)
00100   {
00101     $regexp = "<!--EZT_([a-zA-Z0-9_]+)-->";
00102     if(preg_match($regexp, $templateSource, $matchedData)) {
00103       return $matchedData[1];
00104     } else {
00105       return false;
00106     }
00107   }
00108 
00114   private function hasContextEndTag($templateSource, $contextName)
00115   {
00116     $regexp = "<!--/EZT_" . $contextName . "-->";
00117     preg_match($regexp, $templateSource, $matchedData);
00118     if (count($matchedData)) {
00119       return true;
00120     } else {
00121       throw new YAException(3, $contextName);
00122     }
00123   }
00124 
00131   private function getContextSource($templateSource, $contextName, $type = 0)
00132   {
00133     preg_match("#<!--EZT_$contextName-->(.*)<!--/EZT_$contextName-->#s", $templateSource, $matchedData);
00134     return $matchedData[$type];
00135   }
00136 
00141   private function createContext($context = "|root|")
00142   {
00143     $this->contextInstances[$context] = new YAContext($context, $this->contexts[$context]['src']);
00144 
00145     // Add subcontexts if found
00146     if(@count($this->contexts[$context]['children'])) {
00147       foreach ($this->contexts[$context]['children'] as $childContext) {
00148         $this->createContext($childContext);
00149         $this->contextInstances[$context]->addSubContext($this->contextInstances[$childContext]);
00150       }
00151     }
00152   }
00153 
00159   private function parseTemplate($templateData, $context = "|root|")
00160   {
00161     // If the context already exists, throw an exception
00162     if (isset($this->contexts[$context])) {
00163       throw new YAException(4, $context);
00164     } else {
00165       // Save the context source in the array
00166       $this->contexts[$context]['src'] = $templateData;
00167       // Parse the contexts in the source $templateData
00168       while ($childContext = $this->getContextName($this->contexts[$context]['src'])) {
00169         // If the context isn't closed in the source, throw an exception
00170         if (!$this->hasContextEndTag($this->contexts[$context]['src'], $childContext)) {
00171           throw new YAException(5, $childContext);
00172         } else {
00173           // Execute the parseTemplate method for the context found
00174           $this->parseTemplate($this->getContextSource($this->contexts[$context]['src'], $childContext, 1), $childContext);
00175           // Add the context to the list of childs
00176           $this->contexts[$context]['children'][] = $childContext;
00177           // Replace the context data by an identifier in the source
00178           $this->contexts[$context]['src'] = str_replace($this->getContextSource($this->contexts[$context]['src'], $childContext, 0),"|$childContext|", $this->contexts[$context]['src']);
00179           if (count(explode("|$childContext|", $this->contexts[$context]['src'])) > 2) {
00180             throw new YAException(6, $childContext);
00181           }
00182         }
00183       }
00184     }
00185   }
